vulnerability_findings.name: erc20-interface
vulnerability_findings.message:
ICurio (ICurio.sol#6-12) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transferFrom (ICurio.sol#9)
	-transfer (ICurio.sol#10)

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in ICurio.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.5.0 (ICurio.sol#3): it allows old versions
